notesStmt.note: Text break denoted by a hyphen and 12 spaces; Parallel to, in the published edition of Shlosberg: Halakhot pesuḳot / Aryeh Leyb Shlosberg [ed]. Versailles : Serf, 1886, p. 85 l. 17 ושפחה – p. 86 l. 35 אין לה; approximately 7 lines are missing from the bottom, which included in ibid. p. 86 ll. 4-12 and p. 87 ll. 1-(7); See Danzig: Mavo le-sefer Halakhot pesuḳot / me-et Naṃan Dantsig. New York : JTS, 1993. p. 59 n. 105.
Condition: damaged, lacking bottom fifth and (slightly) upper exterior corner.

msIdentifier.repository: Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library

msContents.textLang: Hebrew; Official Aramaic (700-300 BCE); Imperial Aramaic (700-300 BCE)

history.provenance: Cairo Genizah Collection (University of Pennsylvania. Center for Advanced Judaic Studies. Library).
